name: abrugsch.GitHub.io
body:
### More Details About My Projects.

* [GBCartSlurp](http://abrugsch.github.io/GBCartSlurp/)
A Hardware Gameboy/GBC Cartridge reader for extracting savegame data from GB/GBC cartridges. The project is based on a Raspberry Pi and I2C GPIO port expanders.

* Pico-8 carts (coming soon)
a repo containing cartridges made for the [Pico-8 8-Bit fantasy console](http://www.pico-8.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
